```{r setup, includ:=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(ggExtra)
library(igraph)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
bs = read.csv('results/businesses_mp_dropdraws_20.csv') %>%
  tbl_df
```

```{r}
ggplot(bs, aes(x = ts_rating, y = star_rating)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.05) +
  xlab('TrueSkill Rating') +
  ylab('Star Rating')
```
